title: Santa Claus Tsukamaeta!
synopsis: A simple story about a young boy who stays up on Christmas in order to catch Santa and show the proof to his older friends.
staff: [['Itou, Yuuichi', ['Director', ' Spotting']], ['Akashiya, Sanma', ['Script', ' Executive Producer', ' Original Creator']], ['Hiramatsu, Eri', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics', ' Music']]]
